title: The Magnificent Three
description: A son who doesn’t want to follow in his father’s business. His father is President of Earth (and he’s Vice President).
quote: Signing bills into law was always your dream, not mine.
starring: Harold Zoid, Calculon, John A. Zoidberg
altHero: Harold Zoid as the President, stands with Calculon in the Oval Office
alt2: Calculon splash a glass of water in Zoid’s face
alt3: in the rain, Calculon hands Zoid a piece of paper
alt4: still in the rain, Calculon falls to his knees and yells “Noo!” while Zoidberg watches from a nearby hatch
